properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 08.
TEN METER VESSEL NELA G, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN 39-16.75N 006-40.70E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC LA GARDE,
TELEX: 430024,
PHONE: 334 9461 1616,
FAX: 334 9427 1149,
E-MAIL: LAGARDE@MRCCFR.EU.
